TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 允许由部分信任的代码调用程序集。

span.span: Allows an assembly to be called by partially trusted code.

summary.span: 如果没有此声明，则只有完全信任的调用方才可以使用此程序集。

span.span: Without this declaration, only fully trusted callers are able to use the assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 不再支持部分受信任的代码。Partially trusted code is no longer supported. 此属性在 .NET Core 中不起作用。This attribute has no effect in .NET Core. > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] 引入了新的安全规则，这些规则会影响 属性的行为（请参阅[安全透明代码，级别 2](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-2.md)）。The [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] introduces new security rules that affect the behavior of the attribute (see [Security-Transparent Code, Level 2](~/docs/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-2.md)). 在 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]中，所有代码都默认为安全透明的，即部分受信任。In the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], all code defaults to security-transparent, that is, partially trusted. 但是，您可以批注各个类型和成员，以将它们分配给其他透明度特性。However, you can annotate individual types and members to assign them other transparency attributes. 有关此更改以及其他安全更改，请参阅[安全更改](~/docs/framework/security/security-changes.md)。For this and other security changes, see [Security Changes](~/docs/framework/security/security-changes.md). .NET Framework 版本2.0 （）程序集必须具有强名称，才能有效地使用 （APTCA）特性。.NET Framework version 2.0 () assemblies must be strong-named to effectively use the (APTCA) attribute. [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] （）程序集无需进行强命名即可使 APTCA 属性有效，并且它们可以包含透明的安全关键代码和安全可靠关键代码。() assemblies do not have to be strong-named for the APTCA attribute to be effective, and they can contain transparent, security-critical and security-safe-critical code. 有关在程序集级别应用特性的详细信息，请参阅[应用特性](~/docs/standard/attributes/applying-attributes.md)。For more information about applying attributes at the assembly level, see [Applying Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/applying-attributes.md). 默认情况下，如果强名称程序集未在程序集级别显式应用此特性，则它只能由被授予完全信任的其他程序集调用。By default, if a strong-named, assembly does not explicitly apply this attribute at the assembly level, it can be called only by other assemblies that are granted full trust. 对于程序集中每个可公开访问的类上的每个公共或受保护方法都 `FullTrust`，将强制 执行此限制。This restriction is enforced by placing a for `FullTrust` on every public or protected method on every publicly accessible class in the assembly. 旨在由部分受信任的代码调用的程序集可以通过使用 声明其意图。Assemblies that are intended to be called by partially trusted code can declare their intent through the use of . `[assembly:AllowPartiallyTrustedCallers]`中C#的声明的示例;``Visual Basic 中的示例。An example of the declaration in C# is `[assembly:AllowPartiallyTrustedCallers]`; an example in Visual Basic is ``. > [!CAUTION] > 此程序集级别的属性的存在会阻止将 `FullTrust`放置的默认行为 安全检查，并使程序集可从任何其他（部分或完全受信任的）程序集调用。The presence of this assembly-level attribute prevents the default behavior of placing `FullTrust` security checks, and makes the assembly callable from any other (partially or fully trusted) assembly. 当存在 APTCA 特性时，所有其他安全检查都将按预期运行，包括任何类级或方法级别的声明性安全特性。When the APTCA attribute is present, all other security checks function as intended, including any class-level or method-level declarative security attributes that are present. 此属性仅阻止隐式的完全受信任的调用方请求。This attribute blocks only the implicit, fully trusted caller demand. 这不是声明性的安全属性，而是常规属性（它派生自 ，而不是从 ）。This is not a declarative security attribute, but a regular attribute (it derives from , not from ). 有关详细信息，请参阅[从部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 类。The following example shows how to use the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute/CPP/AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute/CS/AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute/VB/allowpartiallytrustedcallersattribute.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性仅应用于程序集级别。This attribute should be applied only at the assembly level. ## Examples 有关如何使用此构造函数的示例，请参阅为 类提供的代码示例。For an example of how to use this constructor, see the code example provided for the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Security::PartialTrustVisibilityLevel PartialTrustVisibilityLevel { System::Security::PartialTrustVisibilityLevel get(); void set(System::Security::PartialTrustVisibilityLevel value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置用 (APTCA) 特性标记的代码的默认部分信任可见性。

span.span: Gets or sets the default partial trust visibility for code that is marked with the (APTCA) attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下面的示例演示如何使用此属性。The following examples demonstrate how to use this property. - 默认情况下，无条件 APTCA：Default, unconditional APTCA: ``` [assembly: AllowPartiallyTrustedCallers] ``` 默认为 。Defaults to . - 显式，无条件 APTCA：Explicit, unconditional APTCA: ``` [assembly: AllowPartiallyTrustedCallers(PartialTrustVisibilityLevel=VisibleToAllHosts)] ``` 程序集始终可以由部分信任的代码调用。The assembly can always be called by partial-trust code. - 显式的条件 APTCA：Explicit, conditional APTCA: ``` [assembly: AllowPartiallyTrustedCallers(PartialTrustVisibilityLevel=NotVisibleByDefault)] ``` 已针对部分信任审核程序集，但默认情况下，它对部分信任的代码不可见。The assembly has been audited for partial trust, but it is not visible to partial-trust code by default. 若要使程序集对部分信任的代码可见，请将该程序集添加到 属性。To make the assembly visible to partial-trust code, add it to the property.
